org.asoem.greyfish.core.io

Interface SimulationLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JDBCLogger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedJDBCLogger

    public interface SimulationLogger
extends java.io.Closeable
    A SimulationLogger defines methods to write getSimulation events to a given destination of type Closeable.
